CustomDataType.description: This class does not get 'AdditionalProperties = false' in the schema generation, so it can be extended with arbitrary JSON properties to allow adding custom data.

ResetEnumType.description: This contains the type of reset that the Charging Station or EVSE should perform.

evseId.description: This contains the ID of a specific EVSE that needs to be reset, instead of the entire Charging Station.
